name: Bitdefender Incremental Virus Definitions File
summary: Learn about .IVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Periodically the definitions in the base CVD file are updated. When this occurs, the IVD definitions are reset but may then be updated again with the most recent virus definitions until the next CVD refresh.

description: File used by Bitdefender antivirus and Internet protection software; saves virus definition updates which help the software recognize the most recent viruses; used for supplementing the base .CVD virus definitions file with new updates.
